items.name: fast
items.description: High-speed atomic task workhorse. Configure to a model like Haiku. Pair with `smart`.

items.name: smart
items.description: Senior architect for complex refactoring. Configure to a model like Opus. Pair with `fast`.

items.name: openspec-orchestrator
items.description: Enforce strict OpenSpec formatting/validation. For use with Openspec only.
